(2048) <\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC15\">Requested keysize is 2048 bits<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC16\">*press enter*<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC17\">Please specify how long the key should be valid.<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC18\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;0 = key does not expire<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC19\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;n&gt;  = key expires in n days<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC20\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;n&gt;w = key expires in n weeks<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC21\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;n&gt;m = key expires in n months<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC22\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;n&gt;y = key expires in n years<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC23\">Key is valid for? (0) <\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC24\">*press enter*<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC25\">Key does not expire at all<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC26\">Is this correct? (y/N) y<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC27\"><br/><\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC28\">You need a user ID to identify your key; the software constructs the user ID<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC29\">from the Real Name, Comment and Email Address in this form:<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC30\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Heinrich Heine (Der Dichter) &lt;heinrichh@duesseldorf.de&gt;&quot;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC31\"><br/><\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC32\">Real name: Edge Backup Encryption Key<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC33\">Email address: me@domain.com<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC34\">Comment: Encryption key for Edge backups<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC35\">You selected this USER-ID:<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC36\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Edge Backup Encryption Key (Encryption key for Edge backups) &lt;me@domain.com&gt;&quot;<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC37\"><br/><\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC38\">Change (N)ame, (C)omment, (E)mail or (O)kay/(Q)uit? O<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC39\">You need a Passphrase to protect your secret key.<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC40\">*enter passphrase, make sure secure*<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC41\">We need to generate a lot of random bytes. It is a good idea to perform<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC42\">some other action (type on the keyboard, move the mouse, utilize the<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC43\">disks) during the prime generation; this gives the random number<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC44\">generator a better chance to gain enough entropy.<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC45\">....................+++++<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC46\">...+++++<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC47\">We need to generate a lot of random bytes.
